description: React component for a registration step form, handling business info and logo upload with validation.

methods.name: validateFile
methods.description: Validates uploaded file type and size.

methods.name: handleFileSelect
methods.description: Handles file selection, validates, and creates a preview.

methods.name: handleFileInputChange
methods.description: Handles change event for file input.

methods.name: handleDrag
methods.description: Handles drag events for file upload area.

methods.name: removeLogo
methods.description: Removes uploaded logo and resets state.

methods.name: handleBusinessNameChange
methods.description: Updates business name state and validation.

methods.name: handlePhoneChange
methods.description: Updates phone number state and validation.

methods.name: handleNext
methods.description: Validates form and proceeds to next step.
